duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct patient consultations and provide dermatological care including biopsies, cryotherapy, and excisions.
Document patient progress and treatment plans in the electronic medical record system.
Collaborate with dermatologists and medical staff to provide comprehensive patient care.
Assist in surgical procedures and minor surgeries as required.
Educate patients about treatment options, skin care, and disease prevention.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Physician Assistant Studies or related field (Master's preferred)
